data.eml:eml: A third species of Gegeneophis Peters (Amphibia: Gymnophiona: Indotyphlidae) lacking secondary annular grooves

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kotharambath, Ramachandran, Gower, David J., Oommen, Oommen V., Wilkinson, Mark (2012): A third species of Gegeneophis Peters (Amphibia: Gymnophiona: Indotyphlidae) lacking secondary annular grooves. Zootaxa 3272: 26-34, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.212101
